page.title: 15EMPLOYMENT IN DACRE.
page.content: In Dacre most people are farmers. There are people employed at Dalemain in the wine bar,ticket box and the gift shop.There are also guides that show you around the house and estate workers.There is one inn in Dacre and the person who owns it works as a barman.There is a Joiner in Dacre most people are employed apart from those who have retired or have children to see to when they come home from school.Several people travel out of Dacre for employment like Mr.Watson who goes to the Water Board,Mr.Carrick is a baker and some young people work in shops and offices in Penrith.
